entry.title: 19 people arrested in Armenia for operating ‚Äúspy network‚Äù in the military

media:group.media:title: 19 people arrested in Armenia for operating ‚Äúspy network‚Äù in the military
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia once again takes 89th place out of 165 countries in the 2021 Democracy Index. üìçRussia is in favour of organizing a UNESCO mission to Karabakh, says Russian Foreign Ministry Spokeswoman Maria Zakharova. üìç19 people have been arrested in Armenia under suspicion of operating a spy network within the military.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #DailyArmenia

entry.title: Next Steps for The Future Armenian

media:group.media:title: Next Steps for The Future Armenian
media:group.media:description:
Richard Azarnia, Co-Initiator of the FUTURE ARMENIAN Initiative, talks to CivilNet‚Äôs Emilio Luciano Cricchio about the group‚Äôs next steps, the demographics of those who have engaged with the initiative‚Äôs 15 goals and what his message would be to Armenians who want to get involved.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’©

entry.title: Pashinyan‚Äôs declining popularity, what‚Äôs next for Armenia

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan‚Äôs declining popularity, what‚Äôs next for Armenia
media:group.media:description:
In the latest edition of Insights With Eric Hacopian, Eric explains the recent survey conducted by the International Republican Institute and its findings. Eric discusses the declining popularity of Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, attitudes towards foreign countries and what Armenians find an acceptable solution to the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #InsightsWithEricHacopian

entry.title: Armenia sends Azerbaijan proposals on unblocking of regional roads

media:group.media:title: Armenia sends Azerbaijan proposals on unblocking of regional roads
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia has sent Azerbaijan proposals regarding the unblocking of regional highways. üìçAzerbaijani soldiers fired upon workers at a quarry in Karabakh‚Äôs Askeran region. üìçArmenia‚Äôs highest religious authority condemns Azerbaijan‚Äôs move to remove ‚ÄúArmenian traces‚Äù from religious sites in Karabakh.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #DailyArmenia

entry.title: The National Democratic Axis and the Armenia-Turkey normalization process

media:group.media:title: The National Democratic Axis and the Armenia-Turkey normalization process
media:group.media:description:
In the latest edition of Frontlines, Karnig Kerkonian and Garo B. Ghazarian talk to Varuzhan Avetisyan, a member of the National Democratic Axis, an Armenian electoral bloc, about the the organization‚Äôs approach towards the normalization processes between Armenia and Turkey and the challenges Artsakh is facing.
#CivilNet #’ç’´’æ’´’¨’Ü’•’© #frontlines
